Hii, i need to start designing a continuous elevator but I don’t have any experience and my team doesn’t have many years of experience so I would really appreciate it if you guys could share some of your designs for inspiration

There are lots of threads on here with info, just search

You may want to ease the technical burden by looking at COTS elevators

Edit

Other thread on this topic here, please use this ine instead :

Elevator system CAD
Hii i want to design an elevator system and i need help How to start and how to design an elevator? Thanks
